en: Hein ?

en: - Je t'ai fait quoi, en fait ?

It just happened.
 Don't make a bigger fool of yourself than you already have.

You know how much this house costs?
 Of course you don't. You never paid for anything.

Right?
 You get it now?

Không phải à?
 Giờ con đã thấy mẹ đã phải làm tới mức nào để khiến con đồng ý giúp mẹ chưa?

Do you understand that I had to ask Régis
 to make sure that you wouldn't doubt my story?

It's not like I had a son with a good education

That's what I did.
 -You see? It worked.

ELENA: WHERE ARE YOU? I'M WORRIED. CALL ME BACK. LOVE YOU

ELENA ANH ĐANG Ở ĐÂU? EM LO QUÁ…

-Ha!
